resources.string: Chicken sausages and onions with a double layer of cheese.
Rich tomato sauce with a triple layer of mozzarella cheese.
A fusion of BBQ chicken, chicken bacon and sausages complemented with crunchy onions and bell pepper, topped with a layer of mozzarella cheese.
Flavoursome pieces of chicken and crunchy onion with a double layer of cheese.
A combination of kotchchi chicken sausage meat and spicy chicken with crunchy onions and jalapenos placed on a layer of cream cheese and a layer of mozzarella.
Everyoneâ€™s favourite wings, baked just the right amount and given the tangy flavor of BBQ sauce to tantalize taste your buds.
Sliced and spread with garlic buttery goodness!
Take a sip of a creamy concoction of double chocolate and lose yourself in a chocolate comma.
Go red with the delicious flavour of strawberry, mixed and blended into a creamy shake!
